++ Erathis

God of civilization and invention (pg 10 of DM handbook)
Lawful Neutral
Oversees [Ak'anon]
Symbol: Upper half of a clockwork gear

Erathis fuels the industry and inginuity of Ak'anon, burying himself beneath the stone to forever power their mighty furnaces.

When Released:
    -By the city of Ak'anon falling or being abandoned:
        -Will create a new craft for the world to practice that will be particularly effective against the offenders.
